data.message: Are these like the Beatles Sophie who were popular when I was younger - might I like them ? do they play nice tunes that you can hum along to ? They look like nice lads who might even help their grans with shopping etc though I do think someone should tell the boy on the right that he's got his hat on back to front .

replies.message: Oh you're showing your age Richard. But even you must have heard of Eminem 😂
Never heard any of his songs , I'll try YouTube - are you a fan ?...

Mmm..not sure I like it  , tried a track called ' Lose Yourself' where he talked a lot and never really started singing as such - mentioned something about vomit down his sweater which isn't a very good thing to talk about before breakfast , though he wouldn't know that I hadn't eaten yet . I don't think his mum will be very pleased with him being sick on his sweater .
